column4: when you're just starting out, explicit instructions can be helpful, as it's impossible to see the larger picture for a newbie
so I gather. I'm a bit overwhelmed right now, but I'm trying to take things slow and really get to the core of it:)
you're best finding instructions to specific problems you're having
I'm not going to try and learn *everything*, but I read as much as I can so I can to get familiar with things. and, seeing the big picture, as you've said above:)
